Assessment centre: North York General Hospital - Emergency Department

Contact phone: Toronto Western Hospital general inquiries line: 416 603 2581
Accessible parking: Not on site, but we are right beside TWH, where there is accessible parking.  There is also a drop off circle driveway within 50 feet of the entrance.
Queue accomodations: the TWH CAC is currently operated on a first come, first serve basis. There is often a line, which can be up to one hour. We do not offer accommodated access outside of the queue. If someone is unable to wait in line, they are to speak to the security guard, who will arrange to hold the next place in line, and the person can wait at the benches or elsewhere.
